dynamic_line: Come to worship? Sit down, I'll show you the way.
Within this time, the divine shall prevail. Do good to recall this, child.

I'm the priest of this humble church. I do what I can to help my congregation, the poor souls. With all the trouble going around about undead, monsters, and the dragons, the least I can do is make sure they find the gods.
Oh, dear. That'll take a long time to explain.
